snippet: The Dream Defenders, a group of students who have been occupying the governor’s office since July 16, called it quits on Thursday.
abstract: Dream Defenders, group of students pushing for changes to the Stand Your Ground provision in Florida’s self-defense laws, end sit-in at Gov Rick Scott's office after failing to secure a special legislative session on the issue.
lead_paragraph: The Dream Defenders, a group of students who have been occupying the governor’s office since July 16, called it quits on Thursday.

headline.main: Florida: Sit-In Ends at Governor’s Office
headline.print_headline: Florida: Sit-In Ends at Governor’s Office
